title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Haaram - The 'Vanaspati' Necklace
materials: 18K Yellow Gold. Featuring a 1.29 carat Emerald
and 2.84 carats of Sparkling Diamonds (Dwt. 735). Finished with a signature Hyderabadi polish for a rich luster.
features: This stunning necklace showcases a delicate floral pattern. The intricate setting highlights the brilliance of the diamonds and emeralds. The Central part of the necklace resembles floral motifs. A single pearl is set atop the central Emerald, adding a touch of elegance. The necklace has a leaf design throughout, and this design adds to the overall beauty.
colors: and the warm glow of yellow gold.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suited for upscale events where you want to make a statement.
description: This floral Haaram embodies timeless elegance and traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of emeralds, rubies, pearls, and diamonds creates a harmonious balance of color and sparkle. Its eye-catching design will make you the center of attention, adding a touch of glamour to any outfit.
